DataElement.preferredName: Other Growth Factor Or Stem Cell Mobilization Therapy Administered Specify Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The free-text field to describe other growth factors or stem cell mobilization therapy that was administered.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Other Growth Factor Or Stem Cell Mobilization Therapy Administered
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned._Substances made by the body that function to regulate cell division and cell survival. Some growth factors are also produced in the laboratory and used in biological therapy._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._Therapy to cause release of stem cells from the bone marrow into the peripheral blood circulation for the purpose of collection._The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ObjectClass.preferredName: Other Growth Factor Or Stem Cell Mobilization Therapy
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.:Substances made by the body that function to regulate cell division and cell survival. Some growth factors are also produced in the laboratory and used in biological therapy.:An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.:Therapy to cause release of stem cells from the bone marrow into the peripheral blood circulation for the purpose of collection.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
Growth Factors are extracellular signaling molecules (ligands) involved in control of target cell proliferation, cell survival, and cell differentiation. (NCI)

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
Therapy to cause release of stem cells from the bone marrow into the peripheral blood circulation for the purpose of collection.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Modified to suggestion from 2006 review. AK 11/13/13 .

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Be specific about something; define clearly._Text; the words of something written.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Specify; be specific about something; define clearly.:Text; the words of something written.

Concepts.definition: Be specific about something; define clearly.
